# Contact data source

Data source to export contact information, including names, addresses, phone numbers and email addresses

Use this data source to export contact information, including names, addresses, phone numbers and email addresses.

## Objects available in the data store

![Contact_Data_Source.jpg](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/91d50e4f-7574-4a3d-8d3c-fbf01884917c?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..LFcS7jtij2q7fGFejliooJSU3i3MpUV02PXJY8YqpPk)

| Object | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Contact | The contact of the entity/person to whom your product or service is sold. |
| Entity | The entity that the data relates to. Part of the Multi-entity feature. Contains the following fields:Address 1Address 2CityCountryCreated By IDCreated DateDisplay NameEmailIDNamePostal CodeStateUpdated By IDUpdated Date |
